name: Sree's Handicrafts
technology: React JS, CSS3, Material UI, React-Router, Node JS, Express JS, MongoDB, Firebase
description: A responsive full stack niche website built with MERN technology that sells inclusively crocheted items.
feature: There are two general routes: Home, Explore. Further exploration will require login/regestration.
Applied customer route and admin route on dashboard to give user customized CRUD experience based on role and purpose upon verifying email saved on database.

Incorporated gmail password authentication for authorized secure navigation through My Orders, Payment, Review options as a user and Manage All Orders, Add A Product, Manage Products, Make Admin routes as a admin.
In order to grant new admin membership, one must be an admin himself/herself.
Any route except the valid ones will take user to a 404 Not Found page.

name: Wilderness Trekking
technology: React JS, React-Bootstrap, React-Router, CSS3, Bootstrap 5, Node JS, Express JS, MongoDB, Firebase
description: A responsive MERN full-stack website that offers enjoyable trekking experience by arranging guided tours.
feature: There are two general routes: Home, Signin. Further exploration will require user to sign-in.
Integrated Google sign-in authentication to ensure tailored features for every individual user by granting the choice of adding and deleting trip.
Implemented private route to prevent unauthorized user access to several routes.
Signing in will enable Add a New Package, My Bookings, Manage All Bookings and Sign out button.
Any unrecognized route will lead user to a 404 Not Found page.

name: Peace Mental HealthCare
technology: React JS, CSS3, React-Player, React-Router, Material UI, Firebase
description: A responsive striking website that offers information and treatments for various mental health issues.
feature: There are four general routes: Home, About, Research, Sign Up
Integrated Gmail password and Google sign-in authentication.
User login is required to access detailed information of particular mental disorder.
Implemented private routes to prevent unauthorized access.
Any unrecognized route will lead user to a 404 Not Found page.
